trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKZG018_04293_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Despite appearances, Alkmene has a lot on her mind.
TEXT_AKTKZG018_04293_TODO_00<tab>Survey flower beds and obtain aetherial masses.
TEXT_AKTKZG018_04293_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Alkmene.
TEXT_AKTKZG018_04293_ALKMENE_000_000<tab>Awww! Awen't you just <var 1A 02 /var>adowable<var 1A 01 /var>? Yes, yes you are!
TEXT_AKTKZG018_04293_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_AKTKZG018_04293_Q1_000_001<tab>Hewwo!
TEXT_AKTKZG018_04293_Q1_000_002<tab>Can I help you?
TEXT_AKTKZG018_04293_ALKMENE_000_001<tab>Hee hee! That's what I love about familiars─so whimsical! I have a task that is perfectly suited to one such as yourself.

TEXT_AKTKZG018_04293_ALKMENE_000_002<tab>Hee hee! My apologies, dear─your whimsically diminutive stature misled me. Fortunately, I have a task perfectly suited to an oh-so-grown-up familiar such as yourself.
TEXT_AKTKZG018_04293_ALKMENE_000_003<tab>I would like you to inspect the flower beds north of here. I suspect they will have accumulated some aetherial masses.

TEXT_AKTKZG018_04293_ALKMENE_000_004<tab>Should you find any, please bring them to me. Do look carefully, now─if I needed someone to wander off with the task half-finished, I would have asked one of the other researchers.
TEXT_AKTKZG018_04293_ALKMENE_000_008<tab>Even if you see no aetherial masses at first glance, you must scrutinize the flower beds to make sure. I'm certain you can do it!
TEXT_AKTKZG018_04293_SYSTEM_000_010<tab>Though you examine the flower bed closely, there are no aetherial masses to be found.
TEXT_AKTKZG018_04293_SYSTEM_000_015<tab>An aetherial mass floats over the flower bed, ripe for the picking. Probably.
TEXT_AKTKZG018_04293_ALKMENE_000_020<tab>Did you scrutinize every corner of the beds?
TEXT_AKTKZG018_04293_ALKMENE_000_021<tab>As I suspected─masses of earthen aspect.

TEXT_AKTKZG018_04293_ALKMENE_000_022<tab>The gardens of the Twelve Wonders reflect the balance of dynamic and stagnant aether of all six aspects. An excess of activity in a single aspect leads to this type of agglomeration.
TEXT_AKTKZG018_04293_ALKMENE_000_023<tab>'Tis these flowers' way of bearing fruit, so to speak.
TEXT_AKTKZG018_04293_ALKMENE_000_024<tab>Beautiful as that may sound, aetherial masses indicate that we must adjust the aetherial balance in Elpis to maintain an ideal environment.
TEXT_AKTKZG018_04293_ALKMENE_000_025<tab>There's naught for you to worry your dear little head about, of course. Such magic is as simple as breathing for us. Run along, now!
